comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The hour was noon. That is, according to page 10 of the next day's Sydney Morning Herald: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16122999 "Six firms submitted 20 tenders. There were 11 tenders for the cantilever type of bridge, seven for an arch design, and two for an inverted arch." [ ref. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article31210469 ] Dr. Bradfield wrote the subsequent report on tenders. trove.nla.gov.au/work/18667533

comment.author: 51979177@N02
